EmailTemplate.name: Cus Contacted Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Customer Has Requested To Be Contacted About Quote {!CameleonCPQ__QxQuote__c.Quote_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!CameleonCPQ__QxQuote__c.Denial_Recipient__c},
Your customer has requested to be contacted about Quote {!CameleonCPQ__QxQuote__c.Quote_Number__c}. Please review the notes below for reasons/next steps.
Customer Response: {!CameleonCPQ__QxQuote__c.Customer_Response__c}.
Quote Details
Quote Link Executive Summary Link
Thank you,
Best regards, Office Depot Compliance
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this email and attached document(s) may contain confidential information that is intended only for the addressee(s). If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby advised that any disclosure, copying, distribution or the taking of any action in reliance upon the information is prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please immediately notify the sender and delete it from your system."
